Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its unique features and quality, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth and the value it can bring to you, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. We're confident this investment will pay off in terms of functionality, aesthetics, and possibly even resale value. Let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
